source.interface:
* This interface represents the figure formed by two lines diverging from a * common point. The system unit for this quantity is "rad" (radian). * This quantity is dimensionless. Jean-Marie Dautelle 1.0, January 14, 2006
* Holds the SI unit (Système International d'Unités) for this quantity.
<declaration type="Unit" name="UNIT" />
